databaseConfig.sql: SELECT KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.MS_KENSEN_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.KS_SHOUSHO_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.SEND_FLAG, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.VESSEL_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.DATA_NO, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.USER_KEY, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.RENEW_DATE, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.TS FROM KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK

SELECT KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.MS_KENSEN_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.KS_SHOUSHO_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.SEND_FLAG, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.VESSEL_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.DATA_NO, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.USER_KEY, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.RENEW_DATE, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.TS FROM KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK WHERE KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.MS_KENSEN_ID = :MS_KENSEN_ID

SELECT KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.MS_KENSEN_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.KS_SHOUSHO_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.SEND_FLAG, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.VESSEL_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.DATA_NO, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.USER_KEY, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.RENEW_DATE, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.RENEW_USER_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.TS FROM KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK WHERE KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK.KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK_ID = :KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK_ID

INSERT INTO KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK ( KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK_ID, MS_KENSEN_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_ID, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES ( :KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK_ID, :MS_KENSEN_ID, :KS_SHOUSHO_ID, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK SET MS_KENSEN_ID = :MS_KENSEN_ID, KS_SHOUSHO_ID = :KS_SHOUSHO_ID, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID
WHERE (KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK_ID = :KS_SHOUSHO_KENSEN_LINK_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
